data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Li, Gaimari, Stephen D., Yang, Ding (2013): Revision of Sciasmomyia Hendel (Diptera: Lauxaniidae), with eight new species. Zootaxa 3691 (4): 401-435, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3691.4.1
